pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measure of Agreement Between Two Raters // Measure of agreement Delta was originally by Martn Femia (2004) DOI:10.1348/000711004849268. Since then has been considered as agreement measure for different fields, since their behavior is usually better than the usual Kappa index by Cohen (1960) DOI:10.1177/001316446002000104. The main issue with Delta is that can not be computed by hand contrary to Kappa.
